FuncDef: This command configures multicast group IPv4 prefixes for the multicast GRT/VRF with per group mapping extranet functionality. Multiple lines are allowed. Duplicate prefixes are ignored. Operator can either configure specific groups for extranet or specify all groups by using key-word any. The two options are mutually exclusive in configuration.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv4 multicast address prefix with mask.
